Module HunterPaceTimes
Package Classes

Class Division

java.lang.Object
Classes.Division
public class Division
extends java.lang.Object
An object defining the different "sections" for the pace. Each division has a specified goal time that all members of that division aim for.

A division without a specified goal can be considered "Expendable", meaning that in the case that there are no more members in that division, the division can be safely deleted.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Creates an empty Division object

    Creates a Division object under a specified name

  • Constructor Details

    • Division

      public Division()
      Creates an empty Division object

    • Division

      public Division​(java.lang.String name)
      Creates a Division object under a specified name
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the new Division object

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public java.lang.String getName()
      Returns:
      Name of the division

    • setName

      public Division setName​(java.lang.String name)
      Sets the name of the division

      This will not change any team's division, meaning that if there are any teams under the old division name, a new division under the old division name will be created once the divisions are refreshed.

      Parameters:
      name - New name for the division
      Returns:
      Updated Division object with the modified name

    • getGoalTime

      public TimeStamp getGoalTime()
      Returns:
      The goal time of the division

    • setGoalTime

      public Division setGoalTime​(TimeStamp goalTime)
      Sets the goal time of this division.

      This is the goal that all members of the division aim for, and ranking is based upon who got closest to this goal time

      Assigning goalTime to null will result in "marking" the Division as expendable, meaning that if no more members in the division exist, then the division can be safely deleted from the list.

      Parameters:
      goalTime - New goal time
      Returns:
      Updated Division object with the modified goalTime

    • isGoalNull

      public boolean isGoalNull()
      Returns whether or not the goalTime value is set to null. This is what tells the Pace.updateDivisions() whether or not the division can be safely deleted, given no more members of the pace fall under this division
      Returns:
      true if goalTime is null
      false if goalTime is not null
      See Also:
      getGoalTime(), setGoalTime(TimeStamp)
